divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in my backyard smoking a cigarette. It wasn't dark yet as it was only about 5 in the afternoon. I saw a light moving low in the sky. I thought it was a plane at first and watched it as it moved along. I thought it was a little strange that I could see the light of the plane very clearly but not the fuselage or anything else. I also discounted this to distance. I then thought that for the distance is was moving a bit faster than it should since we have a lot of air traffic around us. I continued to watch it then moved behind a tree obstructing my view as I stood stationary. I expected the object to keep on its course and be visible as it moved passed the tree. The object never be came visable again. I was confused and moved to see if it had stopped at that spot or changed course but I never saw it again. It was too high to drop below the tree line. I live on the back of a hill and was looking towards flats and the tree it disappeared behind was only 10 feet from me. There we no clouds and no stars out yet. I felt so confused and stood outside for another 10 minutes trying to figure it out.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Norwalk
There were no other sightings in Norwalk on or around November 29th 2009
